metadata.description: Complete software development lifecycle with spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.2.0: Multi-language support (Python/PHP/Go/Ruby/Rust), README.md context reading. v3.1.0: Project initialization, rollback safety, security auditing, release automation.

plugins.name: specswarm
plugins.description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.2.0: NEW - Multi-language support (Python/PHP/Go/Ruby/Rust), README.md context reading, enhanced auto-detection. v3.1.0: Project init, rollback safety, security audits, release automation. Core features: 4 high-level commands (build/fix/upgrade/ship), 70% workflow simplification, full backward compatibility.

plugins.name: speclabs
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - All functionality moved to SpecSwarm v3.0.0+. This plugin now provides backward compatibility aliases only (/speclabs:* → /specswarm:*). Aliases will be removed in v3.3.0. Please migrate to SpecSwarm commands.

plugins.name: speckit
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecSwarm v2.0+. Use SpecSwarm instead for spec-driven development workflows.

plugins.name: spectest
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecSwarm v2.0+. Performance enhancements now included in SpecSwarm.

plugins.name: speclab
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecSwarm v2.0+. Lifecycle workflows now included in SpecSwarm.

plugins.name: project-orchestrator
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecLabs v1.0+. Autonomous development now unified with advanced debugging in experimental SpecLabs plugin

plugins.name: debug-coordinate
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecLabs v1.0+. Advanced debugging now unified with autonomous development in experimental SpecLabs plugin
